message:
灵感来源


{
    const genders      = ["男", "女"]
    const trans        = ["", "转"]
    const orientations = ["直", "弯", "双性恋", "无性恋"]
    for (const a of genders)
    for (const b of genders)
    if  (a !== b)
    for (const c of genders)
    for (const i of trans)
    for (const j of trans)
    for (const k of trans)
    for (const x of orientations)
    for (const y of orientations)
    for (const z of orientations)
    console.log(`${i}${x}${a}变成${j}${y}${b}，爱上了${k}${z}${c}`)
}
title: 性转题材生成器
